title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, ch. content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, ch. II, pt. 207 - Permission To Serve As An Executive Officer, Director Or Trustee Of Banks, Trust Companies, Savings Banks, Savings And Loan Associations, Banking Corporations, National Banks, Federal Savings And Loan Associations And Bank Holding Companies

State Regulations
§ 207.1 - The depository trust company
§ 207.2 - Freedom national bank
§ 207.3 - Signature bank

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, ch. II, pt. 207

Statutory authority: Banking Law, §§ 130[3][b], 143[3][b], 209[3], 247[5][b], 399[5][b], 399-a[2]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
